question: Some people think that it is a waste of money for countries to big Sporting events like the world cup and that money would be better spent on other things.
text: Sports is considered one of the most important parts of the physical development of young people. My position will be cleared in further upcoming paragraphs.

on the other hand, sometimes Sporting event gets so empower on an individual, that the lost their consciousness that what is going around him or her and from this.
